label: Protocol
title: Certification and verification of assets
body: Deploy non-fungible tokens on the blockchain, store them in cryptographic wallets, own or transfer them. Validate their existence, authenticity and ownership without third-party involvement.

label: Tools
title: A set of functions for developers
body: With 0xcert you can create smart contracts for your ICO, utilize our framework for your own token development, and help yourself out with dapp creation methods. The same protocol applies to various fields and industries, enhancing its interoperability.

label: Dapps
title: Decentralized applications
body: With our secure blockchain agnostic platform, powerful tools and community embraced conventions for managing non-fungible tokens, 0xcert becomes a pluggable settlement with an advanced integration layer for different dapps and relay applications.

label: ZXC Token
title: Unique and agnostic
body: ZXC utility tokens (fungible ERC-20 tokens) support dapps built on top of the 0xcert protocol with minimum possible fees. 0xcert open source project strives to be community driven, allowing for its decentralized governance.
